title: en.wikipedia.org_wiki_Me_%26_Roboco
transformers_text: Me Rob o co Japanese Hepburn Boku to Ro boko is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Shuhei Miyazaki It has been serialized in Shueisha's Weekly Sh nen Jump since July 2020 The series is published digitally in English language by Viz Media A 28 episode anime television series adaptation produced by Gallop was broadcast on TV Tokyo from December 2022 to June 2023 An anime film adaptation premiered in April 2025 Set in a future where every household owns maid robots known as Order Maids average grade schooler Bon do Taira dreams of having his very own robot because his friends Ga chi Gorilla and Mot suo Kane o always brag about Kane o's Order Maid Mei co With some convincing Bon do manages to make his mom agree and get them one but what he receives is an unable to compute maid named Rob o co the most powerful clumsy maid ever created With Rob o co's arrival Bon do's life starts to get a whole lot weirder Written and illustrated by Shuhei Miyazaki Me Rob o co started in Shueisha's sh nen manga magazine Weekly Sh nen Jump on July 6 2020 7 8 Shueisha has collected its chapters into individual tank bon volumes The first volume whose cover is a parody of the first Doraemon volume 9 was released on November 4 2020 10 As of November 4 2025 twenty four volumes have been released 11 The series is published digitally in English language by Viz Media 12 In July 2021 Viz Media announced that they would published the volumes digitally 13 the first volume was released on October 26 2021 14 In May 2022 it was announced that the series would be adapted into an anime television series 55 The series is produced by Gallop and directed by Akita ro D aichi with Michihiro Sato serving as assistant director Sayuri O oba overseeing the series ' scripts and Y ko Ebara designing the characters It was broadcast for 28 episodes from December 5 2022 to June 19 2023 on TV Tokyo and its affiliates and consists of five minute episodes 56 57 The theme song is lol by Gang Parade 3 Crunchy roll streamed the series outside of Asia 58 A film adaptation was announced in June 2023 59 60 It was later announced to be an anime film It was planned to premiere in Q 4 2024 however it was delayed to improve the film's quality and premiered on April 18 2025 61 62 The film's theme song is Lo lilo k kyun Rob o R ori rok ki yun Rob o performed by A no 63 In July 2022 a live action project was announced 64 It was later revealed to be a collaboration with cosplayer Ena ko and a Rob o co figure produced by Sentinel Co Ltd as part of its Rio bot series of figurines 65 66 Me Rob o co was nominated for the Best Printed Manga category in the 2021 Next Manga Awards and placed thirteenth out of 50 nominees 67 The series ranked eleventh on the Nationwide Bookstore Employees ' Recommended Comics of 2022 68
